resources.string: This screen lists all transactions for the current account. From the navigation bar, you can navigate to the accounts list or select a different account.
Opens the form for creating a new transaction.
Transfer money between accounts. This command is enabled only if you have at least one other account with the same currency as the current one.
If you have created templates for the current account, this command displays a dialog for selecting a template from which a new transaction will be created.

This command will export all transactions of the current account to a file on the SD card in QIF or CSV format (configurable in the Settings). By default, the transactions will be deleted from your phone, but you can select to keep them and mark as exported. My Expenses can share the file immediately after the export through FTP, email or any other file sharing app, if you configure it to do so in the Settings.
Adjust the properties of the current account (title, description, opening balance, account type, currency, color).
This screen lists all accounts. You can create new accounts, edit them, or navigate to them
Opens the form for creating a new account.

The aggregates dialog calculates the sum of expenses and income accross all accounts that share the same currency. The command is only available if for any currency there exist at least two accounts (Contrib feature).
This command allows to reset all your accounts in batch. It is not available if there are no transactions to export.
Edit form for transactions, transfers, templates

Click on the - Button to toggle between expense and income, click on the = Button to open a calculator. The input format for amounts can be configured in the settings. The payee (or payer) field remembers the values you enter and will suggest them in the future. The button for selecting a payment method, is only available if the current account is of a type linked to any payment method. By default only bank accounts, are linked to payment methods (cheque,credit card, deposit,direct debit).
Save the data and close the form.
Save the data, leave the form open for creating a new transaction with the same data.
